overview:
Ryan Cooper is the Lead Producer for Battle.net at Blizzard Entertainment. Battle.net is the world’s most connected, dedicated, and fun online gaming communities. It provides millions of gamers a single, powerful, and advanced online gaming service to experience the best of Blizzard games.

Previously Cooper spent nearly 11 years with Microsoft and recently with Xbox where he was responsible for leading teams that built several online multiplayer gaming experiences across Xbox LIVE. His leadership helped shape the evolution of Xbox, Kinect, and Xbox LIVE. An avid gamer, aspiring Bikram yogi, and father, Ryan currently lives in southern California where he is also an entrepreneur and contributor to the arts.
